import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { WorkOrder } from '../work-order'; @Component({ selector: 'app-work-orders', templateUrl: './work-orders.component.html', styleUrls: ['./work-orders.component.css'] }) export class WorkOrdersComponent { workOrders?: WorkOrder[]; /// This method updates the workorder table by adding a new record addWorkOrder(): void { } //TODO create a method to read from the WorkOrders controller for table population }
